name: GGL Projects, Inc.
description: Developer of a product review platform designed to help customers to share ratings and reviews of businesses. The company's product review platform organizes the negative reviews and positive reviews to provides a rating of the product on that basis, enabling users to get an idea of the product quality before buying.
